description:
Automatons dressed as doctors are killing you in the name of Covid19. They don't even care to touch you because they fear exposure to this alleged virus that the mainstream media has made them believe is deadly and is everywhere. 

Brief translation: The gentleman in the video claims he lost one his two daughters within 24hours due to the negligence of the hospital as she wasn't treated for her illness and was left to be.
While his second daughter, who was brought to the hospital for a stomach ache was admitted in the Corona ward by the hospital. After 24 hours she tested negative for Covid and was shifted to the normal ward. By this time her health has detoriated quite a lot because she's not being treated for the actual problem and the hospital tells him that she too is serious now. The father pleads for help.
.
.
.
#covidscam #covidsham #scamdemic #plandemic2020 #hoax #id2020 #event201 #agenda21 #fakestreammedia #propaganda #deepstate #shadowgovernment #conspiracytheories #conspiracyresearch #hospitalskill #agenda2030 #truth #thegreatawakening #wakeup #newworldorder #nwo #wakeup #bhopal #india #madhyapradesh
